Store: Emily Blunt  (Actor),     John Krasinski  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Horror
Product Description: ['If they hear you, they hunt you. In this terrifyingly suspenseful thriller, a family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, Evelyn (Emily Blunt) and Lee (John Krasinski) Abbott are determined to find a way to protect their children at all costs while they desperately search for a way to fight back. Hailed by critics and audiences around the world, experience the must-see movie of the year.']

reference_summary:
HOCUS POCUS
Bette Midler  (Actor),     Sarah Jessica Parker  (Actor),     Kenny Ortega  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['In Disney\'s HOCUS POCUS, Academy Award(R) nominee Bette Midler (Best Actress, 1991, FOR THE BOYS), stars with Sarah Jessica Parker (SEX AND THE CITY) and Kathy Najimy (THE WEDDING PLANNER) as three wild witches who return from seventeenth-century Salem for a night of zany fun and comic chaos. After they\'re conjured up by unsuspecting pranksters, the tricky trio sets out to cast a spell on the town and reclaim their youth. But first they must outwit three feisty kids determined to foil their scheme! Filled with bewitching laughs and magic, this hilarious film is perfect for the whole family!|Producer David Kirschner came up with the idea for the movie one night while he and his young daughter were sitting outside and his neighbor\'s black cat strayed by. Kirschner began to unspool a narrative of how the cat was once a boy who was changed into a feline 300 years ago by three witches.|Actress Kathy Najimy described her character Mary as "Eddie Haskell as a witch," referring to the character on the classic TV series "Leave It To Beaver." "She sucks up to Winifred [Bette Midler\'s character] every chance she gets. She wants to be part of the power club and Winifred\'s got the power."|To create the costumes, designer Mary Vogt read many historical books about Salem, Massachusetts. "I even read diaries of women who were hanged as witches," she says.']

**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Family-Friendly Films**: The user enjoys films suitable for family viewing, with a preference for light-hearted narratives rich in humor and magic. 

- **Willingness to Explore Different Genres**: The recent purchase of a thriller indicates an openness to films that diverge from strictly family-friendly selections, suggesting a nuanced appreciation for storytelling that may involve suspenseful or intense themes.

- **Appreciation for Classic and Nostalgic Content**: Interest in nostalgic films, particularly those tied to childhood memories, remains evident, though the exploration into different genres shows versatility in tastes.

- **Positive Engagement with Popular Acts**: The user continues to favor well-known actors, demonstrated by their purchases featuring prominent talents, which enhances their cinematic experience.

- **Value for Quality and Affordability**: Their feedback on purchases indicates a consistent desire for good quality at an affordable price point, reaffirming their attention to value when selecting media.

- **Support for Entertaining Storytelling**: A preference for engaging narratives persists, whether whimsical or thrilling, reflecting an appreciation for imaginative concepts and diverse storytelling styles.

Overall, the user showcases a broadening range of cinematic interests that retain a foundation in enchanting, family-oriented stories while also embracing thrilling suspense and well-crafted performances.
